pages.text: 3|141|Yibian an la duanlian xindao de ren, er huimie bu xindao de ren.
3|142|An la hai meiyou zhenbie nimen zhong fendou de ren he jianren de ren, nandao nimen jiu yiwei ziji de ru leyuan ma?
3|143|Zaoyu siwang zhiqian, nimen que yi xiwang siwang; xianzai nimen que yi qinyan jian dao siwangle.

3|144|Muhanmode zhishi yige shizhe, zai ta zhiqian, you xuduo shizhe, que yi shiqule; ruguo ta binggu huo zhenwang, nandao nimen jiu yao pan jiao ma? Pan jiao de ren, jue buneng shang sun an la yi sihao. An la jiang baochou ganxie de ren.

3|145|Bude an la de xuke, renhe ren dou bu hui siwang; an la yi zhuding ge ren de shou xianle. Shei xiang huode jinshi de baochou, wo gei shei jinshi de baochou; shei xiang huode houshi de baochou, wo gei shei houshi de baochou. Wo jiang baochou ganxie de ren.
3|146|You xuduo xianzhi, ceng youxie mingzhe he tamen yitong zuozhan, naxie mingzhe meiyou yin zai zhu daoshang suo zaoshou de jiannan er huixin, xiedai he qufu. An la shi xi'ai jianren zhe de.
3|147|Tamen meiyou bie dehua, zhi shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni she you women de zui'e, he women de guoshi, qiu ni jianding women de bufa, qiu ni yuanzhu women yi duikang bu xindao de minzhong.”
3|148|Gu an la jiang jinshi de baochou he houshi youmei de baochou shangci tamen, an la shi xi'ai xingshan zhe de.
